epics.title: Notification UI Enhancements
epics.description: Implement a comprehensive notification system with a bell icon, dropdown, and full page view.

stories.title: Add Notification Bell Icon to Header
stories.description: Implement a notification bell icon in the header with an unread count badge and animation for new notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Notification bell icon is visible in the header
Unread count badge displays up to '99+'
Bell animates briefly when a new notification arrives
Positioned on the right side of the header before the user avatar

agent_context.goal: Enhance user engagement by providing a visual cue for new notifications.
self_check: Is the bell icon visible on all screen sizes?
Does the animation meet performance standards?

stories.title: Implement Notification Dropdown
stories.description: Create a dropdown showing recent notifications with navigation and management options.
acceptance_criteria: Dropdown shows a list of the last 20 notifications
Each notification displays an icon, title, timestamp, and read/unread state
'Mark all as read' link is present at the top
'View all' link is present at the bottom
Clicking a notification navigates to the relevant page

agent_context.goal: Provide users with quick access to recent notifications and management options.
self_check: Does the dropdown handle large notification lists efficiently?

stories.title: Create Full Notification Page
stories.description: Develop a full notification page with pagination, filtering, bulk actions, and search capabilities.
acceptance_criteria: Page displays all notifications with pagination (20 per page)
Users can filter notifications by type and read/unread status
Bulk actions available: mark selected as read, delete selected
Search functionality by keyword is available

agent_context.goal: Allow users to manage and search through all their notifications efficiently.
self_check: Are search results accurate and fast?

epics.title: Notification Delivery and Preferences
epics.description: Implement real-time notification delivery and customizable user preferences.

stories.title: Implement Real-time Notification Delivery
stories.description: Enable real-time notification delivery using WebSocket with fallback mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: Notifications appear instantly using WebSocket
Fallback to polling if WebSocket fails
Toast notification for high-priority items
Subtle sound plays for notifications, with user option to disable

agent_context.goal: Ensure users receive notifications in real-time to improve engagement.
self_check: Does the fallback mechanism activate correctly?

stories.title: Develop Notification Preferences Settings
stories.description: Allow users to customize notification settings including type toggles, delivery methods, and quiet hours.
acceptance_criteria: Users can toggle each notification type on/off
Users can choose delivery method per type: in-app, email, both, none
Users can set quiet hours for no push notifications
Email digest options: immediate, daily, weekly, never

agent_context.goal: Provide users with control over how and when they receive notifications.
self_check: Are preference changes saved and applied correctly?
Is the UI intuitive for all user types?

epics.title: Mobile Notification Support
epics.description: Ensure notifications are mobile-friendly with responsive design and touch interactions.

stories.title: Optimize Notification UI for Mobile
stories.description: Ensure the notification dropdown and interactions are mobile-friendly.
acceptance_criteria: Responsive dropdown design for mobile
Touch-friendly tap targets
Swipe to dismiss notifications on mobile

agent_context.goal: Ensure users have a seamless notification experience on mobile devices.
self_check: Is the UI responsive on all mobile devices?
Are touch interactions smooth and intuitive?
